name: Skies of K-9
description:
Our project from Global Game Jam 2020

Space Puppies must work together as they travel through a field of asteroids, collecting stardust to repair their ship all while fighting off sky beasts.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys to Move

SPACE to jump

E to interact/shoot

ESC to cancel itneraction

https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/skies-k9-2-0
